name: DodgeRoll (Technonut)
description:
"DodgeRoll" is a topdown shooter where you play as a Dice. Your dodge roll assigns you one of 6 diffrent weapons depending on what you land on.

Use this to defeat the ludo pieces.... (dont ask)

CONTROLS:

Move - WASD/Arrow Keys 

Shoot - Left Click

Dodge Roll - Space

CREDITS:

Fonts by Codeman38

Programming, Art and everything else by me :)
